description: "Map of the Riouw (Riau) Residency, Sumatra. The border between Riau and the island’s west coast is marked in red ‘as far as it is known [voor zoo verre die... bekend is]’, ending abruptly in the unexplored mountains near Lake Toba, northern Sumatra."
title: "Kaart der residentie Riouw met onderhoorigheden, aangrenzende deel van Sumatra's Westkust en schiereiland Malakka"
